name: Fast Video OCR
description: Uses OCR.space API to extract text from YouTube video frames.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://api.ocr.space; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; object-src 'self';
